name: Crystal Phone
description: Can make calls and texts. Some applications are also functional.

name: Crystal Pistol
description: A magic powered gun that can deal some damage. Deals 1d6 damage at range with ammo. Requires proficiency to use without LOSING LEVERAGE.

name: Crystal Top
description: Makes research and some applications more achievable. You can roll WITH LEVERAGE when doing research.

name: Knife
description: Deals 1d4 damage and doesn't require proficiency to use.

name: Extendable Baton
description: A handy danady extendable baton. Not the most threatening weapon but you can certainly give someone a thrashing. This deals 2 damage and doesn't require proficiency to use.

name: Tazer
description: Can be used to try to stun someone. Make a melee attack against an afflictable target. On a SUCCESS, the target is stunned. The next roll against them HAS LEVERAGE. You deal 1 damage before ARMOR on a SNAG.

name: Nunchucks
description: A great weapon for a skilled martial artist. Tricky to use though. Deals 1d4 + 1 damage.

name: Staff
description: A quality staff can be used well by a skilled martial artist. Deals 1d6 damage.

name: Light Covert Vest
description: Reduces incoming damage by 1 when worn.

name: Heavy Bullet Proof Vest
description: Reduces incoming damage by 2 when worn. (Can't reduce damage to 0)

name: Weed x 5
description: Whatever form you enjoy THC, for the next 1d4 rolls you make, you LOSE LEVERAGE. If you're sharing with someone, you GAIN LEVERAGE when you use social rollls with them.

name: AMF (Arcane & Magic Field) Jacket
description: You can block a lot of magical energies and frequencies. Reduces damage from spells and magic by 1.

name: Brass Knuckles
description: Adds +1 to what would otherwise be unarmed damage.

name: Magicwaveable Food
description: A simply okay meal for the magician on the go! Stick in the magicwave for 5 minutes for near instant gratification.

name: Arcane Ramen x 5
description: We saved you the time of boiling water by sticking a Heat Infusion scroll on the cup! Just say the incantation to enjoy truly instant ramen!
